title: The Cinnamon Recipe Book: Discover Delicious Cinnamon-Spiced Recipes!
description: Looking for cozy recipes that have a touch of cinnamon in them? If so, you’ve come to the right place! Cinnamon is amazing because it can be used both in sweet as well as savory dishes, and that is what you’ll get in this book! Filled with delicious and flavorful recipes that are chockful of cinnamon-y flavor, this book has something in it for everybody and every occasion! From breakfast recipes like Blueberry Chia Seed Pudding and Baked Berry Oatmeal to dessert recipes like Pumpkin Cheesecake and Honey Baklava, this book has a wide variety of recipes that covers everything!
author: Valeria Ray
